name: 蕭郁達
objective:
本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉還路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
This course contents the introduction of control valve and controller, process dynamics, close loop control system, tuning of feedback controller, frequency response techniques, and cascade control system.
schedule:
Week 1 – Introduction to Process Control
Week 2 – Laplace Transforms
Week 3 – Transfer Function Models
Week 4 – Process Dynamic Behaviors
Week 5 – Control Valves and Instrumentation
Week 6-7 – Feedback Controllers
Week 8 – Midterm Exam
Week 9-10 – Stability of Closed-Loop Control Systems
Week 11-12 – PID Controller Tuning
Week 13-14 – Frequency Response Analysis
Week 15 – Feedforward and Ratio Control
Week 16 – Cascade Control
Week 17 – Multiloop and Multivariable Control
Week 18 – Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Participation 20%
Assignments and Quiz 40%
Midterm Exam 20%
Final Exam 20%
materials:
1. Dale E. Seborg, Thomas F. Edgar, Duncan A. Mellichamp, Francis J. Doyle III, “Process Dynamics and Control Techniques”, 4th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2017.
2. Self-made materials
